entry.block: To work properly on small scale you need some very fine brushes with a strong point. And because the hair taken from a squirrel's tale is mollesin, the most careful ones use the of oldest rats' hair and even of dormouses if they can find some and put two or three in the middle of a brush. These brushes draw a straight line like a quill and all the other hairs stick to them. The hair of a stone marten or of a weasel and small animals used to make some musk are even better for just one hair is necessary in a brush
